message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you and I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $9500 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now.  Given its value to me, I'm prepared to offer $8200.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a new offer. I'll sell the product to you for $9000. This is a fair price that still reflects its value to you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9000 is still a bit out of my price range.  I'm comfortable offering $8500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product and the fact that we are both trying to reach a deal. Let's see if we can reach an agreement at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8800. This is as close as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
